sub_title: Head of Innovation Implementation and Scale Up  at SUNTORY BEVERAGE & FOOD EUROPE

profile_positions.description:
Lead the R&D, Supply &Technical co-ordination on key  innovation projects until successful industrialization, including leading the dialogue and alignment with the Integrated Supply organization on the short-term capabilities and capacities to deliver the portfolio and long-term production capabilities required to enable delivery on growth strategies with scale and efficiency

Key Responsibilities include:
1. Works with Innovation Hub and markets to agree on &  implement project strategies, processes and standards
2. Align with R&D Markets  and innovation Hub the strategic direction for R&D Project Management consistent with business plans
3. Collaborate with Supply on the Capex budgeting and Capex application for Innovation Projects, including investment strategic plan link to Innovation.
4. Provide Project Management and Design Management excellence, leadership, governance and drives compliance
5. Enforces compliance to project, divisional and regional standards and systems
6. Delivers against this project management strategy by working transversally with/through markets and other central functions 
7. Drive excellence in innovation execution
7.1Active participation in product development phase with specific emphasis on supply impact.
7.2 Set up and coordinate multi disciplinary project team to deliver scale of industrialization 
7.3 Development of the operational readiness and scaling up plan, and drive the execution of this plan
7.4 Drives quick and effective handover process between central projects team, supply region and markets
profile_positions.title: Head of Innovation Implementation and Scale Up

profile_positions.description:
Implementation & Change Manager
•	Implemented Project Management Methodology in a highly international working environment 
••	Implemented a structured Change Approach for the Various SC projects by organizing workshops to: - 
o	Assess the change impact and new processes with the various business units across the Europe, Africa, Middle East and Caribbean region. 
o	Effectuate the changes from the different sourcing, capability and ways of working projects. 
o	Set up the tracking and monitoring program to monitor change impact progress (includes setting KPIs)

•	Business Optimisation
o	Driving continuous improvement and business optimisation by process re-engineering, capability building, logistics network design and optimisation, strategic sourcing, and helping the business improve customer value by developing the knowledge base and tools necessary to give them a competitive advantage in the market.
•	Project Lead and Project Manage Key Strategic Projects viz.
o	New Business Development in USA/Canada 
o	Revisit the Finished Good Sourcing/Co packer model
o	Set up Business Continuity for supply of Schweppes Premium Mixers. 

Head of Customer Operations
•	Head up an energized X functional team of 10 Customer Operational Specialists in partnering 150 customers in over 80 countries in Delivering our Product On Time In Full.  We do this by providing reliable service by proactive coordination and expertise across the Supply Chain. 
•	Drive operational excellence and continuous improvement in Order to billing for international portfolio of customers
•	Manage Stakeholder (ExCom and Director) Level engagement on Business Reviews, Optimization Opportunities, Trade off Discussions and Resource planning. 
•	Drive performance and provide visibility on key KPIs throughout organization
•	Contribution to the S&OP cycles
•	Support roll-out of Kaizen PDCA and root cause analysis mindset on day to day activities of team
profile_positions.title: Customer Operations Manager & Change/Implementation Manager

company.name: SUNTORY BEVERAGE & FOOD SOUTH AFRICA LIMITED

profile_positions.company: SUNTORY BEVERAGE & FOOD SOUTH AFRICA LIMITED
profile_positions.description:
•	Lead the Supply Chain core planning processes for Africa Middle East and Caribbean (AMC) Business Unit. Focus upon developing consistent S&OP and inventory management processes and to provide focus around the strategic planning and budgeting cycles. 
o	Support local management teams in driving S&OP across AMC Sub business units
o	Define Supply Chain KPIs and Root Cause Analysis
o	Develop capability within the SC community through necessary training, workshops, action learning studies and courses. 
•	AMC business development activities through supply chain initiatives/ projects. To include, contract manufacturing possibilities, M&A planning and integration, Logistics studies, New Product Development.
o	Participate in the review and due diligence of acquisition targets. Manage integration activities where appropriate 
o	Annual Planning and Budgeting: Manage timely completion of the annual budgeting and strategic planning processes. Review capacity planning and capex planning
o	Lead and coordinate supply side activities relating to major new project launches. Ensure Quality, Engineering, Procurement, and Supply Chain resources and activities are executed in a timely and efficient manner
o	Identify and set up the appropriate contract production arrangements before transferring on-going management to local teams
o	Create a network of Co packers able to serve the AMC business as it evolves globally
o	Design and set up of the export hub for all Finished Goods and Concentrate exports through Amsterdam




•	Lead the Local sourcing project, setting up local manufacturing of products in Trinidad and Ghana
profile_positions.title: Head of Supply Chain Planning and Business Development

profile_positions.description:
Key Responsibilities: -
•	Custodian and subject matter expert (SME) of the Smartgate process and system for SAB ensuring it is fit for purpose and applied consistently by all users. This includes effective training, coaching and monitoring compliance.
•	Establish project management capability, ways of working and process for the effective development, industrialization & commercialization of innovation projects. This included the developing and rolling out of the process of industrializing the project at production sites & monitoring projects post launch
•	Single point of contact for the Board (direct reporting into the Board) for ALL Projects, providing clear communication of project updates, scenarios, tradeoffs, risks & mitigations, financial indicators and impact on business strategy.
•	Development of the Capex Portfolio for All NPD related Projects.
•	Lead the SC &Technical co-ordination on all projects until successful industrialization which included leading the dialogue and alignment with the Integrated Supply organization on the short-term capabilities and capacities to deliver the portfolio and long-term production capabilities required to enable delivery on growth strategies with scale and efficiency
•	Develop and Manage a strong and effective team of Project Managers (dept. size 11 FTEs) to deliver the business objectives. This included personally driving capability development and establishing a resource utilization model for capacity planning
profile_positions.title: Head of Project Management Office

profile_positions.description:
•	Built and rolled out a common set of practices (Stage Gates), principles and templates for managing projects
•	Delivered the SAB Project Portfolio - NPD (innovation), Value Engineering, Renovation Project, Promotion on Time, In Full and within or better than Budget by: - 


o	Managing the project for its entire duration from Project Initiation through to 13 weeks post launch, including quality management, risk management, deviations and scenario planning, escalations and progress reports
o	Ensuring transparency and regular interaction across cross functional team members (centrally, regionally and externally), as well as stakeholders (board)
o	Manage the budget (OPEX and Capin) to ensure the project is delivered profitably
o	Drive the volume and pricing triangulation for each project
o	Stakeholder management and engagement, ensuring integration of implementation efforts with the broader business
o	Managing 15 - 17 projects in parallel, with at least 60% of the projects being Gold Initiatives – strategic board sponsored projects for the business.
•	Manager of the Innovation Portfolio which includes project allocation based on resource loading & capability, implementation of the Smart Gate Process and managing compliance to 
gate requirements, setting up and facilitating the Gate Approval Forums with Snr Management and the Board and official communicating NPDs to Production and Sales regions via Roadshows
•	Manager of the Capability Portfolio which includes building capability within the PMO team by development of the capability assessment and defining the interventions (together with HR) to close the gaps.
•	Led the Launch Monitoring Portfolio which including tracking project performance against launch criteria across cross functional team, to ensure deviations to plan are contained and that the root cause is identified and corrective actions are put into place.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Lead the CIC (Customer Interaction Center) integration into Supply Chain (SC) Planning to drive improvement on OTIF. Implemented the following optimization initiatives: - 
	Creating visibility of the customer’s true demand and incorporating this demand into the demand forecast process for normalization. 
	Redesign of Available to Promise Stock Rules – To ensure the business has full visibility of their customers’ demands to fulfill their orders efficiently. 
	Creating visibility (via dashboard) of the unconfirmed open orders throughout the chain to potentially fulfill the order 
•	SC rep on the Project centralizing Primary and Secondary Distribution which included: -
o	Evaluation of benefit and monitoring benefit realization from fleet optimization 
o	Evaluation of PD/SD integration models from other global best practice companies
o	Defining roles and responsibilities to support the integrated PD/SD process
•	Business representation on the Lean Efficient restructuring project: -
o	Conducted capability assessments on key positions
o	Evaluated different scenario to estimate the financial impact and equity impact
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Director Executive Assistant

profile_positions.description:
•	Designed and Launched the SC scorecard and Business Intelligence Dashboard that provides visibility of the SC reliability through root cause analysis. 
•	Implemented Short Interval Control for the key SC KPIs including Visual Management
•	Leading the Implementation of the Global Supplier Evaluation Methodology: -
•	Lead the Optimization Work stream of the SC Strategy which including:
o	Conducting action unit visits to best practice organization to gain insights 
o	Conducted a gap analysis of where the current organization is compared to BP
o	Developed strategies to optimize
•	SC Lead on the Distribution Direct Shipment Project and responsible for defining & implementing the operating model for Direct Shipment
•	Project Lead for Redesigning the Planning and Procurement interface (process and organization) which included
o	Identification of the gaps, designing, documenting and implementing the ‘to be’ optimized process
o	Development & rollout of ways of working, roles and responsibility matrix, DILO, WILO and performance tracking
o	Development of SLA between customers
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Development Consultant

profile_positions.description:
•	Lead and Delivered Key Strategic & Process Optimization Projects which included: 
o	PET Preform Supply Backward Integration Project for ABI 
o	Developed the business case for optimizing the Metal Can and End Costs by investigating a Greenfields and Brownfields Supplier. Developed the cost model and performed feasibility studies on the scenarios.
o	Conducted a Logistic Optimization study for identifying the preferred geographic location for setting up another Malting operation in South Africa.
o	Completed the Value at Risk evaluation for key commodities in South Africa to assist in hedging and cover decisions.
o	Set up of the Supplier Solvency Evaluation for Strategic Suppliers
profile_positions.title: Executive Assistant to Supply Chain Commercial Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Optimise Shell’s refinery margin by capturing the maximum available international margin at Sapref whilst meeting local and export term demand, and balancing the refinery barrel with spot exports/imports (including crude and feedstock selection)
•	Economical optimization of Shell’s share of Sapref through monthly nomination process (Sapref is JV between Shell and BP)
•	Determine the refinery balancing of product exports/imports in terms of economics and volumes.
•	Coordinate the activities of Manufacturing and Supply teams to ensure optimal planning and execution of plans
profile_positions.title: Refinery Economist

profile_positions.description:
•	Business Process Owner for the Master Data and Procurement work streams for the Global Standard SAP ERP rollout which included: - 
o	Harmonizing the design of procurement processes across the region by facilitating cross functional workshops with the business units across Europe, Asia, and Africa. 
o	Gate-keeps process knowledge transfer across countries
o	Led the change management and adoption of new processes in key business units in Asia and Africa. 
•	Process Design Lead for setting up of the Regional (Asia, Africa, Middle East) Central Sourcing Hub in Switzerland which including leading the design and implementation of the operating model
profile_positions.title: Procurement Business Process Lead for SAP Implementation

profile_positions.description:
•	Supply Chain Programme Manager for all Unilever Home and Personal care innovation projects within Asia, Africa, and Middle East & Turkey. This included:

o	Capturing & synthesising overall category needs in terms of capacity, capability and flexibility across all business units




o	Leading the Supply Chain adoption and rollout of global category projects within local business units. 
o	Scanning of the supply market for innovations and supplier capability.
o	Integrate material strategies and Category SC strategy clearly outlining impact to the business
•	Optimisation and Value Delivery within the HPC Category by:
o	Conducting competitor benchmark studies 
o	Project managing the material savings program. 
o	Support SC on manufacturing site consolidation by comparing COGS
o	Make recommendations to category for preferred options (cost, speed to market, complexity, coherence with material global strategy)
profile_positions.title: Innovation Project Manager for Procurement

profile_positions.description:
Key Responsibilities: -
•	Developed and implemented category strategies for total cost reduction across all Packaging for Unilever Africa Middle East & Turkey. Approx. Annual Spend on Packaging = Euro 1.2 bln 
•	Strategic alignment to Global Packaging Teams 
•	Led tenders & negotiation with suppliers including the use of e sourcing tools
•	Set up and management of contracts and Service level agreements
•	Supplier Audits/Qualifying, KPI’s (OTIF) tracking of Regional suppliers
•	Development of the Budget for Packaging Procurement incl. forecasts on commodity movements.
•	Developed tools to 
o	Monitor commodity trends and translation to material pricing, 
o	Evaluate supplier performance
o	Benchmark suppliers across different business units
profile_positions.title: Asia Africa Middle East Turkey  Packaging Supply Manager
